long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I've just released my game "Gallery of Hidden Objects" on Chrome and I think you might enjoy it!😊

It's a completely free web-based game with NO ADS, NO IAP or SUBSCRIPTIONS.🚫

What makes it special?🤩

*🎨 20 different scenes, each with its own unique art style that stands out from other hidden object games.

*⏳ New scenes will be added over time, so the game will keep growing.

*🔥 Made with Flutter and Flame Engine. Especially developed as Chrome Extension but anyone can play it.

*🌍 Play it anywhere: on your PC, Mac, Laptop, Android Phone/Tablet, iPhone, or iPad. As long as you have a browser, you’re good to go.

*🗣️ The game fully supports 18 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Polish, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, Arabic, Hindi, Malay, Indonesian, Vietnamese, and Thai.

*💾 It saves your internet data. Right now, the game downloads about 45mb in the first run and uses cached data on successive runs.

*🔒 Your privacy matters: The game doesn’t collect any of your data. It only saves your progress and time scores locally, so you can enjoy it with no worries.

☕ If you enjoy the game and want to support me, you’ll find links to Buy Me a Coffee and Patreon in the game. Any support is greatly appreciated!

📢 Feel free to check it out and let me know what you think. I’d love to hear your feedback!

🎮 Play Now ---> Thanks for Playing!!! 🙌
